description.feature_1: Scan any document instantly with your mobile device by just a few steps. Save as PDF,JPG,ZIP,TXT and Word format.
description.feature_2: Draw, scan or import your signature and stamp with a simple touch. Sign and stamp any document with just a single tap!
description.feature_3: Scan multiple pages or documents in multiple-scanning mode. Batch all scans as a single document.
description.feature_4: Apply advanced filters and enhance quality with various custom made filters. Manually edit brightness and contrast by your own choice on the custom filters.
description.feature_5: Export your scans as PDF,JPG,ZIP,TXT and Word.
